reference_summary:
e.l.f. Cosmetics All Over Color Stick - Pink Lemonade
e.l.f.
['New Instantly Brightens Eyes, Lips and Face Naturally Illuminates for a Healthy Glow Instantly Soothes & Conditions Skin Multi-Purpose Formula Safe, Gentle Formula Instantly beautiful, healthy-looking skin designed, formulated and tested by our professional team of makeup artists.']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 3 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Date First Available': 'May 14, 2009', 'Manufacturer': 'E.L.F. Cosmetics'}
This is a pretty color but I bought this blush based on the ingredients shown in the picture on the back of the package which have a low toxic rating. HOWEVER the product I received has a different ingredient list that includes BHA which according to the Skin Deep website is a Human endocrine disruptor - strong evidence. As well as petrolatum classified as expected to be toxic or harmful  This also has proplyparaben a Human immune toxicant or allergen - strong evidence.  So I'm not sure I should use it which is a waste of money.  It rates an overall moderate toxic level according to EWG.
Moderately Toxic
Jade Rose Quartz Roller for Face 2 in 1 Gua Sha Set Including Rose Quartz Roller and Jade Face Massager 100% Real Natural Jade Facial Roller Anti Aging Face Roller Massager by Rayfarmo
RAYFARMO
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 7.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '680727935887', 'Manufacturer': 'RAYFARMO'}
I like the cool feel of the stone on my face.  The small end of the roller gives a nice light massage.  The extra stone piece is nice for other areas like the arms and such.  The roller is smooth.  The extra stone piece can really work tension out.
Massaging
